title: Tesla announces the best friend-referral offer ever | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Tesla Founder Model
X](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

**Tesla drivers with the gift of the gab can earn themselves a free Model X
motor if they manage to convince ten friends to jump on board with Elon Musk’s
electric car bandwagon.**

The newly announced friend-referral initiative will allow the Tesla owner to
get $1,000 off a car, services or Tesla accessories every time a friend buys a
new car too.

The first person to reach the golden number of ten referrals will get a
completely free limited edition Founder Series Model X with all of the
options.

The model isn’t even available to the public, but anyone who racks up ten
referrals will be able to buy one of those vehicles too. So, in terms of Telsa
cool points the stakes are about as high as they could be.

Those only making it half way there will still get $1,000 for every one of
referrals, but will also be invited to the grand opening of Tesla’s
gigafactory in Reno, Neveda.

world?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/tesla-powerwall-explained-the-
home-battery-to-spark-an-energy-revolution)**
